## Purpose

Ingest data from regional accounts 

```{r}
df <- read_excel("data/regional-accounts/import.xlsx")

df %>% 
    pivot_longer(-`GDP`) %>% 
    relocate(name, .before = `GDP`) %>% 
    rename(year = name) %>% write.csv("data/regional-accounts/exp.csv")

```
